metadata.title: CVE-2024-38862 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmkversions <2.3.0p18, <2.2.0p35, <2.1.0p48 and <=2.0.0p39 (EOL) causes SNMPand IMPI secrets of host and folder properties to be written to audit logfiles accessible to administrators.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
